Notes

[l=Columbia Records Pressing Plant, Carrollton, GA] pressing denoted by "G" etch in runouts. Issued with custom lyric/credit inner sleeve. No “STERLING” stamp in runouts. Recorded at Fantasy Studios, Berkeley, CA and The Plant Studios, Sausalito, CA. Additional recording at The Automatt, San Francisco, CA. Mixed at The Power Station, New York, NY. Mastered at Sterling Sound, New York, NY. Made in U.S.A. ℗ & © 1983 Chrysalis Records All songs published by Hulex Music/Red Admiral Music (BMI) except: A2 published by Chinnichap Publishing Inc./Careers Music, inc.
